Everything. We’ve redesigned our app based on what matters to you, introducing new features and making it easier than ever to use. With AARP Now you can:

• STAY CONNECTED – Catch up on daily news written with you in mind
• GET OUT IN YOUR COMMUNITY – Explore events happening nearby
• UNCOVER SAVINGS – Find member discounts in your neighborhood
• ENJOY MOBILE MEMBERSHIP – Join AARP and start using your mobile card from day one
• NEVER MISS OUT – You have the option to set notifications about upcoming events and deals that interest you.

Everything. We’ve redesigned our app based on what matters to you, introducing new features and making it easier than ever to use. With AARP Now you can:

• STAY CONNECTED – Catch up on daily news written with you in mind
• GET OUT IN YOUR COMMUNITY – Explore events happening nearby
• UNCOVER SAVINGS – Find member discounts in your neighborhood
• ENJOY MOBILE MEMBERSHIP – Join AARP and start using your mobile card from day one
• NEVER MISS OUT – You have the option to set notifications about upcoming events and deals that interest you.

Performance enhancements and bug fixes
New features:
- Click on your AARP membership card to reveal the scannable barcode
- Add your AARP membership card to your Apple Wallet for easy access
- Auto-renew your 1 year AARP membership in the app
- Use Apple Pay as a payment option

* Log in to the NOW app using your AARP Member Number or email address
* It’s easier than ever to create a registered account in the app using your email address and join if you’re not already a member
* Connect your AARP Member Number to your registered account
* Enhanced location services options

-Easily access your digital membership card for offers redeemable onsite with the new “Show My Card” button
-Now you can save deals and set reminders for your favorite offers right from the benefits feed—saving you time
-With improved search, your favorite offers are now just a touch away. Easily change your location and search for specific deals or events!

Bug fixes & performance enhancements.

• The offer details page has a new look! You can now see multiple ways to redeem offers.
• Search the Deals tab with new navigation options. You can view all or search by specific category.

*View the new "Inbox" section for personalized membership information, helpful tools, and new activities, selected just for you.
*Find new limited time member offers in your Inbox and Deals feeds. Offers are valid for a limited time so be sure to take advantage of them when you see them!
*See where your nearby member benefits are with an improved map view when you allow AARP Now to "use my location"

AARP Rewards is here! Get ready for whatever life throws your way with our new AARP Rewards program designed to help your mind, body, and bank account. View the "My AARP" section to opt-in to AARP Rewards, plus:

- Access AARP Rewards points, savings, and hundreds of ways to learn and earn.
- Sync your smartphone or favorite fitness tracker to earn more points for steps, swimming, and cycling.
- Earn 50% more points as an AARP Member.

- Sync your smartphone or favorite fitness tracker to earn more points for steps, swimming, and cycling.
- Earn 50% more points as an AARP Member.

AARP Rewards is here! Get ready for whatever life throws your way with our new AARP Rewards program designed to help your mind, body, and bank account. View the "My AARP" section to opt-in to AARP Rewards, plus:

- Access AARP Rewards points, savings, and hundreds of ways to learn and earn.
- Sync your smartphone or favorite fitness tracker to earn more points for steps, swimming, and cycling.
- Earn 50% more points as an AARP Member.
